Classes/Statement.html#/s:8FeistyDB9Stat.name: next()
Classes/Statement.html#/s:8FeistyDB9Stat.abstract: Returns the next result row or nil if none.

Classes/Statement.html#/s:8FeistyDB9Stat.name: count(of:reset:)
Classes/Statement.html#/s:8FeistyDB9Stat.abstract: Returns information on a statement counter.

Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.name: lookasideUsed
Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.abstract: The number of lookaside memory slots currently checked out

Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.name: cacheUsed
Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.abstract: The approximate number of bytes of heap memory used by all pager caches

Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.name: schemaUsed
Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.abstract: The approximate number of bytes of heap memory used to store the schema for all databases

Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.name: stmtUsed
Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.abstract: The approximate number of bytes of heap and lookaside memory used by all prepared statements

Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.name: lookasideHit
Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.abstract: The number malloc attempts that were satisfied using lookaside memory

Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.name: lookasideMissSize
Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.abstract: The number malloc attempts that might have been satisfied using lookaside memory but failed due to the amount of memory requested being larger than the lookaside slot size

Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.name: lookasideMissFull
Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.abstract: The number malloc attempts that might have been satisfied using lookaside memory but failed due to all lookaside memory already being in use

Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.name: cacheHit
Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.abstract: The number of pager cache hits that have occurred

Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.name: cacheMiss
Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.abstract: The number of pager cache misses that have occurred

Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.name: cacheWrite
Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.abstract: The number of dirty cache entries that have been written to disk

Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.name: deferredForeignKeys
Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.abstract: Returns zero for the current value if and only if all foreign key constraints (deferred or immediate) have been resolved

Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.name: cacheUsedShared
Classes/Database/StatusParameter.html#/s.abstract: Similar to cacheUsed except that if a pager cache is shared between two or more connections the bytes of heap memory used by that pager cache is divided evenly between the attached connections

Classes/Database/WALCheckpointType.html#.name: passive
Classes/Database/WALCheckpointType.html#.abstract: Checkpoint as many frames as possible without waiting for any database readers or writers to finish

Classes/Database/WALCheckpointType.html#.name: full
Classes/Database/WALCheckpointType.html#.abstract: Blocks until there is no writer and all readers are reading from the most recent database snapshot then checkpoints all frames

Classes/Database/WALCheckpointType.html#.name: restart
Classes/Database/WALCheckpointType.html#.abstract: Same as WALCheckpointType.full except after checkpointing it blocks until all readers are reading from the database file

Classes/Database/WALCheckpointType.html#.name: truncate
Classes/Database/WALCheckpointType.html#.abstract: Same as WALCheckpointType.restart except it also truncates the log file prior to a successful return

Classes/Database/VirtualTableModuleOptio.name: constraintSupport
Classes/Database/VirtualTableModuleOptio.abstract: Indicates whether the virtual table module supports constraints

Classes/Database/VirtualTableModuleOptio.name: innocuous
Classes/Database/VirtualTableModuleOptio.abstract: The virtual table module is unlikely to cause problems even if misused.

Classes/Database/VirtualTableModuleOptio.name: directOnly
Classes/Database/VirtualTableModuleOptio.abstract: The virtual table module is prohibited from use in triggers or views

Classes/Database/SQLFunctionFlags.html#/.name: deterministic
Classes/Database/SQLFunctionFlags.html#/.abstract: The function gives the same output when the input parameters are the same

Classes/Database/SQLFunctionFlags.html#/.name: directOnly
Classes/Database/SQLFunctionFlags.html#/.abstract: The function may only be invoked from top-level SQL, and cannot be used in views or triggers

Classes/Database/SQLFunctionFlags.html#/.name: subtype
Classes/Database/SQLFunctionFlags.html#/.abstract: Indicates to SQLite that a function may call sqlite3_value_subtype()to inspect the sub-types of its arguments

Classes/Database/SQLFunctionFlags.html#/.name: innocuous
Classes/Database/SQLFunctionFlags.html#/.abstract: The function is unlikely to cause problems even if misused.

Classes/Database/FTS5TokenizationReason..name: document
Classes/Database/FTS5TokenizationReason..abstract: A document is being inserted into or removed from the FTS table

Classes/Database/FTS5TokenizationReason..name: query
Classes/Database/FTS5TokenizationReason..abstract: A MATCH query is being executed against the FTS index

Classes/Database/FTS5TokenizationReason..name: prefix
Classes/Database/FTS5TokenizationReason..abstract: Same as query, except that the bareword or quoted string is followed by a * character

Classes/Database/FTS5TokenizationReason..name: aux
Classes/Database/FTS5TokenizationReason..abstract: The tokenizer is being invoked to satisfy an fts5_api.xTokenize() request made by an auxiliary function

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: init(inMemory:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Creates a temporary database.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: init(readingFrom:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Creates a read-only database from a file.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: init(url:create:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Creates a read-write database from a file.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: init(rawSQLiteDatabase:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Creates a database from an existing sqlite3 * database connection handle.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: isReadOnly
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: true if this database is read only, false otherwise

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: lastInsertRowid
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: The rowid of the most recent successful INSERT into a rowid table or virtual table

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: changes
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: The number of rows modified, inserted or deleted by the most recently completed INSERT, UPDATE or DELETE statement

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: totalChanges
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: The total number of rows inserted, modified or deleted by all INSERT, UPDATE or DELETE statements

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: interrupt()
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Interrupts a long-running query.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: url(forDatabase:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Returns the location of the file associated with database name.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: withUnsafeRawSQLiteDatabase(block:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Performs a low-level SQLite database operation.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: StringComparator
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: A comparator for String objects.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: addCollation(_:_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Adds a custom collation function.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: removeCollation(_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Removes a custom collation function.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: addTokenizer(_:type:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Adds a custom FTS5 tokenizer.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: CommitHook
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: A hook called when a database transaction is committed.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: setCommitHook(_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Sets the hook called when a database transaction is committed.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: removeCommitHook()
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Removes the commit hook.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: RollbackHook
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: A hook called when a database transaction is rolled back.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: setRollbackHook(_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Sets the hook called when a database transaction is rolled back.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: removeRollbackHook()
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Removes the rollback hook.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: WALCommitHook
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: A hook called when a database transaction is committed in write-ahead log mode.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: setWALCommitHook(_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Sets the hook called when a database transaction is committed in write-ahead log mode.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: removeWALCommitHook()
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Removes the write-ahead log commit hook.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: UpdateHook
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: A hook called when a row is inserted, deleted, or updated in a rowid table.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: setUpdateHook(_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Sets the hook called when a row is inserted, deleted, or updated in a rowid table.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: removeUpdateHook()
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Removes the update hook.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: BusyHandler
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: A hook that may be called when an attempt is made to access a locked database table.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: setBusyHandler(_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Sets a callback that may be invoked when an attempt is made to access a locked database table.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: removeBusyHandler()
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Removes the busy handler.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: setBusyTimeout(_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Sets a busy handler that sleeps when an attempt is made to access a locked database table.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: SQLFunction
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: A custom SQL function.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: addFunction(_:arity:flags:_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Adds a custom SQL scalar function.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: addAggregateFunction(_:arity:flags:_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Adds a custom SQL aggregate function.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: addAggregateWindowFunction(_:arity:flags:_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Adds a custom SQL aggregate window function.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: removeFunction(_:arity:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Removes a custom SQL scalar, aggregate, or window function.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: addModule(_:type:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Adds a virtual table module to the database.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: addModule(_:type:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Adds an eponymous virtual table module to the database.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: prepare(sql:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Returns a compiled SQL statement.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: execute(sql:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Executes an SQL statement.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: results(sql:_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Executes an SQL statement and applies block to each result row.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: batch(sql:_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Executes one or more SQL statements and optionally applies block to each result row.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: begin(type:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Begins a database transaction.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: rollback()
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Rolls back the active database transaction.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: commit()
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Commits the active database transaction.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: isInAutocommitMode
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: true if this database is in autocommit mode, false otherwise

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: TransactionBlock
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: A series of database actions grouped into a transaction

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: transaction(type:_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Performs a transaction on the database.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: begin(savepoint:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Begins a database savepoint transaction.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: rollback(to:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Rolls back a database savepoint transaction.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: release(savepoint:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Releases (commits) a database savepoint transaction.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: SavepointBlock
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: A series of database actions grouped into a savepoint transaction

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: savepoint(block:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Performs a savepoint transaction on the database.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: walCheckpoint(type:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Perform a write-ahead log checkpoint on the database.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: prepareStatement(sql:forKey:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Compiles and stores an SQL statement for later use.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: preparedStatement(forKey:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Returns the compiled SQL statement for key.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: setPreparedStatement(_:forKey:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Stores a compiled SQL statement for later use.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: removePreparedStatement(forKey:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Removes a compiled SQL statement.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: withPreparedStatement(forKey:_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Executes the compiled SQL statement for key and after execution resets the statement.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: subscript(_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Returns or stores the compiled SQL statement for key.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: BackupProgress
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: A callback for reporting the progress of a database backup.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: backup(to:progress:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Backs up the database to the specified URL.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: status(ofParameter:resetHighwater:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Returns status information on the current and highwater values of a database parameter.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: beginReadTransaction()
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Begins a long-running read transaction on the database.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: endReadTransaction()
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Ends a long-running read transaction on the database.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: updateReadTransaction()
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Updates a long-running read transaction to make the latest database changes visible.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: execute(sql:parameterValues:_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Executes sql with the n parameters in values bound to the first n SQL parameters of sql and applies block to each result row.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: execute(sql:parameters:_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Executes sql with value bound to SQL parameter name for each (name, value) in parameters and applies block to each result row.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: execute(sql:parameterValues:_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Executes sql with the n parameters in values bound to the first n SQL parameters of sql and applies block to each result row.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: execute(sql:parameters:_:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Executes sql with value bound to SQL parameter name for each (name, value) in parameters and applies block to each result row.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: takeSnapshot(schema:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Records a snapshot of the current state of a database schema.

Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.name: openSnapshot(_:schema:)
Classes/Database.html#/s:8FeistyDB8Datab.abstract: Starts or upgrades a read transaction for a database schema to a specific snapshot.

Classes/Statement.html.name: Statement
Classes/Statement.html.abstract: A compiled SQL statement with support for SQL parameter binding and result row processing.

Structs/Row.html.name: Row
Structs/Row.html.abstract: A result row containing one or more columns with type-safe value access.

Other%20Typealiases.html.name: Other Type Aliases
Other%20Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
